FuncDef: This command enables the ETH-LMM test within the OAM-PM session to collect per-FC counters. This command must be used in combination with thecollect-lmm-fc-statscommand for the entity over which the source MEP is defined. Theconfig>oam-pm>session>ethernet>priorityvalue must match the numerical value that represents the FC name (7 = NC, 6 = H1, 5 = EF, 4 = H2, 3 = L1, 2 = AF, 1 = L2, 0 = BE).
